FUNCTION DESCRIPTIONThe Language Specialist translates, edits, and proofreads texts from and/or into English and Arabic languages, as follows:Translate written content, including documents, reports, marketing materials, and more, from the source language to the target language and vice versa.
Ensure translations are accurate, clear, and culturally appropriate, while maintaining the original tone and intent.
Proofread and edit translated materials to eliminate errors and improve readability.
Maintain high standards of quality in your work, check for errors or inconsistencies, and take steps to correct them.
Collaborate with internal teams to provide linguistic expertise and support on language-related matters.
Stay up-to-date with industry-specific terminology and trends in both source and target languages.
Conduct research when necessary to understand and convey specialized topics or unfamiliar terms.
Handle multiple translation projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines.GENERAL DUTIESEmbrace and embody the core concept of Al Hakem being a Value-centered company.

Bachelor's degree in Translation, Linguistics, or a related field.
